text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Three days from now, I will ask each<n>of you for your
reasoning again.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I would like you to provide a concrete<n>example of your plan
to me then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The next day, I'm lost in thought,<n>trying to figure out how
best to<n>approach the question Symboli Rudolf<n>posed.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well, now... We meet again. Is the<n>opposite seat taken?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. The cafeteria's starting to<n>fill up, and I don't
want to take up a<n>table by myself.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: My apologies if I'm prying, but... You<n>seem troubled.
choice_data_list:
I was actually thinking about what you said
yesterday.

I was actually thinking about what you said
yesterday.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Ah, I had a sneaking suspicion you<n>might be. It seems I've
placed a<n>burden upon your shoulders.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It might not be my place to say this,<n>but try not to overthink
it. There's a<n>time to reflect, and a time to rest.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Let's see. While you're here, why<n>not nourish the mind
with something<n>sweet?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The natural sugars in fruits,<n>vegetables, and grains help the
brain<n>to function, and can enhance your<n>concentration.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If I were to recommend something<n>from today's menu, I
would say the<n>seasonal fruit salad is your best bet.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh... I suppose I'm preaching to the<n>choir, aren't I? You are
a professional<n>trainer, after all.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I didn't mean to lecture you. I'm<n>afraid my mind tends to
get lost in<n>details.
choice_data_list: You really think everything through, huh?
You really think everything through, huh?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Of course. Proper nutrition is vital to<n>maintaining peak
physical and mental<n>well-being.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Choosing the optimal meal for your<n>current condition is quite
an important<n>consideration.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Naturally, this applies to things other<n>than food as well.
Every aspect of<n>one's daily life must be contemplated<n>
mindfully.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
It's key to think of the broader<n>perspective—how each small
decision<n>is an invaluable step toward the top.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Haha, it's really nothing special. I'm<n>not used to being
complimented on my<n>diet choices.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I was taught to think strategically,<n>ever since I was little. It's
become so<n>ingrained in me, there's no fixing it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But, well... I suppose that's part of<n>the problem.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Symboli Rudolf's eyes flick to another<n>part of the cafeteria. I
follow her gaze.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Y-yikes... It sounds like the<n>president's having a
super-serious<n>talk with that trainer...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text:
Let's go sit somewhere else. We<n>don't want to interrupt
them with our<n>chatter!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
...You see what I mean? I sat with you<n>to avoid taking that
empty table, but<n>the students still won't sit at it.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
A student council president should be<n>
approachable—someone they can look<n>to for advice. A
leader they can trust to<n>guide them...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
However, it seems I tend to intimidate<n>my peers instead,
what with how stiff<n>my conversations tend to become.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
If only I were capable of more casual<n>and engaging
conversation, I could be<n>more approachable...
choice_data_list: How about we try a practice conversation now?
How about we try a practice conversation now?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Practice? You mean, with you?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hahaha!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, my apologies. It's just... How do I<n>put it? You're really
going the extra<n>mile for me. I wasn't expecting such<n>a
kind offer.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: All right, why not? Let's give it a try.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Could you start us off with a topic?<n>Anything will do—choose
whatever<n>you feel most comfortable with.
choice_data_list: What are your hobbies, aside from running?
What are your hobbies, aside from running?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hobbies, is it? That's certainly a good<n>warm-up topic.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
I think I would have to say chess. It's<n>fun to play, of course,
but it's equally<n>thought-provoking to analyze past<n>score
sheets.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Reading the board, predicting the<n>opponent's moves,
planning each<n>action to advance a bigger goal... You<n>could
even say chess is a microcosm<n>of our lives—

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Wait. That was not at all a casual<n>conversation, was it?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Hmm. I know Rome wasn't built in a<n>day, but this is more
challenging than I<n>thought.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Oh, that reminds me! I've actually<n>been researching other
ways to<n>enhance small talk!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
Namely in the form of jokes. Some<n>witty repartee to lighten
up a room and<n>put people at ease!
choice_data_list: Okay! Hit me with your best shot!
Okay! Hit me with your best shot!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Very well. Here goes!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text:
The other day, I was walking down<n>the street when I saw a
dog with so<n>marvelous a coat that I couldn't help<n>but
exclaim, "My, that coat is...

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: —paws-itively wonderful!"

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Well? What do you think?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This... is a side of Symboli Rudolf I<n>didn't expect. I feel like
I've gained<n>some insight into who she is as a<n>person.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Hrm... "paws-itively wonderful..."I thought that was pretty clever...
